definition: full moon/to hope/to expect/to visit/to gaze (into the distance)/to look towards/towards
15th day of month (lunar calendar)/old variant of 望[wang4]
to see/to meet/to appear (to be sth)/to interview

sentences.english: Sam:You can enjoy the Lake Geneva and the Mountain Blane in each room.
sentences.chinese: 还有房间都可以望见日内瓦湖和白朗峰。

sentences.english: He thought that he already distinctly perceived the brink of the bottomless abyss.
sentences.chinese: 他仿佛已清清楚楚地望见那无底深渊边上的陡壁。

sentences.english: Cosette saw him through the hole in her shutter.
sentences.chinese: 珂赛特能从她的板窗洞里望见他。

sentences.english: From the top to the hill on the island we could see the blue sea on every hand.
sentences.chinese: 从岛上的山顶我们可以望见四处是茫茫碧海。

sentences.english: When the Emperor saw me he frowned, and said to me, "What is thy name?
sentences.chinese: 皇帝望见我，便蹙起眉头对我说，“你姓甚名谁？

sentences.english: He suddenly beheld the table-land of Mont-Saint-Jean cleared, and the van of the English army disappear.
sentences.chinese: 他望见圣约翰山高地突然空虚，英军的前锋不见了。

sentences.english: Why, we'll be in sight of the Northern mountains then.
sentences.chinese: 晤，然后我们就会望见北方的崇山峻岭。

sentences.english: We can see both hills and waters.
sentences.chinese: 既能望见山，又能看见水。

sentences.english: When straightening up, I saw the blue sea and sails.
sentences.chinese: 直起腰来，我望见蓝色的大海和帆影。

sentences.english: On the lofty heights, the pure light of mind could be seen flickering.
sentences.chinese: 人们望见在宁静的顶峰上闪颤着思想的纯洁光辉。

sentences.english: What largeness thinks in Paradise was sawn.
sentences.chinese: 可望见想象无穷的天堂。

sentences.english: I saw a curtain move in the den.
sentences.chinese: 我望见书房里的窗帘被人拉开。

sentences.english: In the deepest desperation, I always see the most beautiful scenery.
sentences.chinese: 我老是在最深的绝望里望见最美的风光。

sentences.english: When straightening up, I saw blue sea and sails.
sentences.chinese: 直起腰来，我望见蓝色的大海和帆影。

sentences.english: Round group Leader Mountain from the fishing village can hope to see Yangshuo.
sentences.chinese: 从渔村绕到龙头山就可以望见阳朔了。

sentences.english: You can enjoy the Lake Geneva and the Mountain Blane in each room.
sentences.chinese: 还有房间都可以望见日内瓦湖和白朗峰。

definition: to survey the scene from an elevated position
to gaze at/to stare fixedly at
to look around/to peep (through a crack)/to peer at/to throw a look at
to gaze afar/to look into the distance
to shade one's eyes with one's hand
to raise one's head and look into the distance/fig. to forward to/to long for
